title: Trans Europ Express
brief_description:
A film director, on the Trans Europ Express from Paris to Antwerp, decides to write a script about a sadistic drug smuggler on his way to Antwerp to collect a shipment of cocaine. There, the character gets involved with a prostitute and is caught up in a series of perilous situations. Reference: Bloomsbury Foreign Film Guide.

Credits: Producer, Samy Halfon ; director, writer, Alain Robbe-Grillet ; photography, Willy Kurant.
Cast: Jean-Louis Trintignant, Marie-France Pisier, Daniel Emilfork.
